content: Continue up the path, where you'll have to face off against numerous soldiers along the way. This is really just a chance for you to test the power of Jingubang, and pick up some extra Will and Sparks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Return Path'.
The content is as follows:
Continue up the path, where you'll have to face off against numerous soldiers along the way. This is really just a chance for you to test the power of Jingubang, and pick up some extra Will and Sparks.
